MPI

MPI is a specification for message-passing. It manages distributed memory communication within Elemental and is also called directly by LBANN. Common implementations include MPICH, Open MPI, and MVAPICH2. Elemental, and hence LBANN, requires implementations that meet the MPI-2 specification.

Installation on Linux

Talk to your sysadmin.

Installation on OS X

Use Homebrew: 

 {.sh}
$ brew install mpich2
